title: Same Denominators
text: Make sure the fractions have the same denominator before adding them.
speech: Make sure the fractions have the same denominator before adding them.
pacedSpeech: Make sure the fractions have the same denominator before adding them.

title: Divide Rational Expressions
text: Since the denominators are the same, put both of the numerators of the rational expression over a single denominator.
speech: Since the denominators are the same, put both of the numerators of the rational expression over a single denominator.
pacedSpeech: Since the denominators are the same, put both of the numerators of the rational expression over a single denominator.

title: Finding Numerators
text: Group the numerators by like terms.
speech: Group the numerators by like terms.
pacedSpeech: Group the numerators by like terms.

title: Adding and Subtracting the Numerators
text: Subtract the numerators from each other.
speech: Subtract the numerators from each other.
pacedSpeech: Subtract the numerators from each other.

title: Simplify
speech: Can  fraction, p squared plus 2 n minus 3, over, p squared plus 4 p minus 5,   be simplified further?
pacedSpeech: Can   fraction, p squared plus 2 n minus 3, over, p squared plus 4 p minus 5,

title: Factoring
text: Try factoring the numerator and denominator.
speech: Try factoring the numerator and denominator.
pacedSpeech: Try factoring the numerator and denominator.

title: Factoring the Numerator
text: Notice that the numerator can be factored by undoing the FOIL.
speech: Notice that the numerator can be factored by undoing the FOIL.
pacedSpeech: Notice that the numerator can be factored by undoing the FOIL.

title: Factoring the Denominator
text: Notice that the denominator can be factored by undoing the FOIL.
speech: Notice that the denominator can be factored by undoing the FOIL.
pacedSpeech: Notice that the denominator can be factored by undoing the FOIL.

title: Simplify
text: Can something in the numerator and denominator cancel out and simplify?
speech: Can something in the numerator and denominator cancel out and simplify?
